project_abstract.cdata: The Guanzhong Irrigation Improvement Project aims to improve the existing irrigation systems in Guanzhong Plain of Shaanxi Province and thereby raise agricultural production and farm incomes. There are eight project components. 1) Improvement and expansion of water source will improve the existing nine irrigation areas and develop some tracts of land. 2) Improvement of major distribution system will support repair and completion of concrete panels or masonry lining in main and branch canals. 3) The component will support rehabilitation of pumping stations in six irrigation districts (IDs). 4) This component will improve the existing minor canals, drains, and on-farm development works on partially irrigated land, and expand new systems to land that currently has no irrigation distribution network at the lateral level. 5) Improvement of operation and maintenance will improve access roads to key infrastructure works and renovate management stations and research facilities. 6) Training, study tours, and technical assistance will improve the knowledge and understanding of resources. 6) Project management arrangements will ensure good coordination between government bureaus and irrigation districts associated with project implementation. 7) This component will supervise IDs in finalizing the designs for the canal improvement works. 8) The component will facilitate land acquisition to accommodate enlarged storage facilities and relocate the people affected.

P051888.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>关中灌区改造项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>项目旨在提高陕西省渭河流域关中平原九大灌区的粮食产量，增进当地农民收入，加强灌溉管理。该地区是陕西省的主要粮棉油生产基地，主要依靠灌溉取得高产，而现有的灌溉和排水系统都是50、60年代修建的，亟待进行修复改造。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
